channel.title: Math Question
channel.description:
If you can please help me with this, I have been trying to figure it out for awhile.
Here it is:
[code]After 9 months, the simple interest earned of an investment of $1200 dollars is $72 dollars. Find the interest rate.[/code]+
Thanks in advanced,
`Jake

item.title: Math Question
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

(72/1200) / 9 * 12 = 0,08 or 8% interest rate for one year.

Read full topic
